reviewtext: Never had one of these before..  easy to carry and use and really works a treat !I searched around until I found a marker cap that fits the brush end so dirt can't get into retracted brush between uses.  they should have done that but none of the brands do that I've seen.Good item..Caution;  Some other well known brands of the SAME tool can cost over $20 and seem to be the same Mfg.
summary: This and a good dust blower for DSLR
